q1: How does shoe size conversion work?
a1: We convert based on foot length in centimeters, which is the universal baseline for all shoe sizing systems.
a2: Shoe sizes vary slightly between brands. These conversions follow standard sizing charts and provide good approximations.
a3: US Men, US Women, UK, EU (European), and centimeters (foot length).
q4: What is the difference between US Men and US Women sizes?
a4: US Women sizes are typically 1.5 sizes larger than US Men for the same foot length.
